text: Pork Chop Hill is a 1959 American Korean War drama movie directed by Lewis Milestone and based on the 1956 novel by S.L.A. Marshall. It stars Gregory Peck, Rip Torn, Woody Strode, George Peppard, George Shibata, Martin Landau, Barry Atwater, Abel Fernandez, Biff Elliot, Harry Dean Stanton. It was distributed by United Artists. It was a minor box office hit. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1959 war movies Category:1959 drama movies Category:1950s American drama movies Category:American war movies Category:Movies directed by Lewis Milestone Category:Movies set in South Korea
title: Pork Chop Hill
